subject: Interview scheduling for Senior Developer position
content: Coordinated with client for technical interview scheduling. Candidate is available Tuesday-Thursday afternoons.

subject: Follow-up on interview feedback
content: Discussed interview performance with client. Positive feedback on technical skills, concerns about communication style.

subject: Candidate presentation and discussion
content: Presented top 3 candidates for the Project Manager role. Client showed strong interest in candidate #3.

subject: Reference check completed
content: All references contacted. Excellent feedback from previous employers. Recommended for hire.

subject: Quarterly talent review meeting
content: Discussed ongoing hiring needs, updated job requirements, and reviewed performance of recently placed candidates.
